name: bailiff
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(in the UK ) an official who takes away someone's possessions when they owe money: They didn't pay their rent, so the landlord called/sent in the bailiffs.
(in the US) an official who is responsible for prisoners who are appearing in court
(in the UK ) a person whose job is to take care of someone else's land or property
